description: This Asian-inspired seared tuna salad is so simple and quick to make and zingy ponzu gives it great flavour.
keywords: Seared Tuna with Cucumber & Rice Noodle Salad
name: Seared Tuna with Cucumber & Rice Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a griddle pan on the highest setting and sear each tuna steak for 20-30 seconds on each side. Rest for 5 minutes then serve with the noodle salad and ponzu sauce drizzled on top.
